::Shredder::

Shredder rolls to the left, Quickstrike's shot hitting him in his right 
shoulder. He aims his rifle at Quickstrike's chest, pulling out a pistol with 
his other hand and aiming that at Quickstrike too.

"I don't want to kill you," he says to the fuzor, "So calm down. Megatron 
would be displeased if I told him about your behavior."
